entry.title: Set of 3 | Silver Long Stem Mercury Glass Cylinder Vase, Candle Holder Set - 12"|14"|16"
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 34.99 - 125.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 3 Long Stem Vase (Different Sizes)
Material: Glass
Color: Silver
Style: Mercury Style Long Stem Glass Vase Candle Holder
Small Vase Height: 12”
Medium Vase Height: 13.75”
Large Vase Height: 15.75”
Glass Thickness: 3mm
Top Opening Diameter: 4"
Base Diameter: 4"
Depth: 4"
Fits standard Size Votive Candles and Tea Lights
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Top Length: 4"
  • Small Vase Neck Length: 7.5"
  • Medium Vase Neck Length: 9.5"
  • Large Vase Neck Length: 11.5"
  • Order is for Vases only. Flowers and other decorations are not included.
  • Note: There is a slight dip in each vase. it is not a flat surface.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

entry.title: Set of 3 - Mercury Glass Silver Pillar Candle Holders, Taper Candle Holders - 7", 8", 10"
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4320
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 29.99

[About]
Quantity: Set of 3 Pillar Candle Holders
Material: Hand Blown Mercury Glass
Color: Silver
Style: Pillar Candle Holders
Sizes: 7" | 8.5" | 10"
Top/Base Diameter: 4" 
Top Depth: 0.5"
Top Inner Diameter: 3"
Base Hole Diameter: 1"
3" Pillar candles fit perfectly into the top of this holder
Perfect for Home, Weddings, Churches, Restaurants, and Events
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information] 

Handcrafted Mercury Glass

Shiny splattered metallic mercury glass finish coupled with baroque construction makes this tantalizing trio a stunning piece of art. Handcrafted with intricate artistry, these lovely Pillar Candle Holders are full of character and make regal accent pieces to enticingly glam up any dull and plain space.

Sleek & Stylish

Sleek and stylish, these fine candle stands boast modern aesthetics and mystic metallic sheen. Add an air of urbanity to your living room shelves, coffee tables, mantle, and even kitchen counters with these beauties. Create a dazzling display of shine and sparkle by lighting our pillar candles, make one of a kind centerpieces by incorporating with fresh or faux flower arrangements, or use these as breathtaking standalone accent pieces.

Versatile & Multipurpose

Versatile and multipurpose, use either to elegantly hold your pillar candles, or flip the stick to nestle your taper candles for a radiant display of shine and sparkle. Premium glass construction makes these beauties a sturdy and durable decorative accessory to be used indoors and outdoors with the same classy sophistication.

Wedding Centerpieces

Perfect to be used as standalone accent pieces, you can create epic party and wedding centerpieces by either lighting pillar or taper candles in the sticks or give a refreshing twist to your home and party décor by topping these with flower balls, bouquets, and garlands. Besides making breathtaking accent pieces, these taper candle holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and house warming.
Additional Information:
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

[Information]

Marvel the glossy luster of pretty pearls or feel the imperial charm of intricate metallic construction; this glam piece will leave you wonderstruck in so many appealing ways! Stunningly spectacular from head to toe, our Pearl Embedded Metal Chandelier Candle Holder features rows and rows of beautifully boastful pearls coiled in sleek metal loops to heighten the enchantment of Tea Lights, Votive Candles, and Tapers that you illuminate inside the gorgeous holders. Standing gracefully on a spangled splayed weighted base, the holders will provide a firm and topple-free support to your candle decoration. Create a bedazzling display of height and dimension by pairing these multi-heighted Stands with our Metal and Crystal Wedding Centerpiece Collection, Chandelier Candelabras, Mirror Top Centerpiece Risers and more!

Additional Information:
  • Uses : Wedding, Party,  Birthday, Event, Table Decoration, Centerpieces

entry.title: Set of 3 | Hurricane Long Stem Glass Vase Candle Holder Set - 12"|14"|16"
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4500
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 34.99 - 124.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 3 Long Stem Vase (Different Sizes)
Material: High Quality Glass
Color: Clear
Style: Hurricane Long Stem Glass Vase Candle Holder
Small Vase Height: 12” 
Medium Vase Height: 14” 
Large Vase Height: 16” 
Glass Thickness: 2-3mm
Top Opening Diameter: 5"
Base Diameter: 4"
Depth: 5"
Fits standard Size Votive Candles and Tea Lights
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Sleek, slender, and so very stylish! This gorgeous trio of Exquisite Erika Glass Vase Candle Stands Centerpieces will change the entire landscape of your Wedding or Party Tables. Seamless transparency of premium quality glass construction coupled with elegant design impart these dreamlike darlings an air of stately sophistication. Flared mouth gives enough space to showcase our Pillar Candles, Tea lights, Taper Candles, or LED Submersible Candles and Flower Bouquets in an enticing style, while the Tulip Cup is almost 5" deep; quite ample capacity to enchantingly exhibit colorful pearls, diamonds, stones, sand, confetti, jelly beans, glitter, silk petals and other lovely Vase Fillers. Beautifully cut and styled solid glass stem is firmly supported by a splayed flat base to avoid toppling and collapsing.

Gift this charismatic combo to your loved ones as a token of your affection, or create a fanciful party ambiance by placing these beauties atop Decorative Mirrors on our Sequin and embroider embellished Tablecloths, Table Linens, Table Runners, or Table Covers, swathed with Luminous String and Fairy LEDs, and filled with Candles, and Pearl Beads. 

 Additional Information:

  • Pedestal Candle Holder Flower Vase Multipurpose Set
  • Note: Candles and other decorations are not included
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration 
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.
